title: Family Life
summary: Understand family roles, build positive routines, practice budgeting, and carry out a meaningful service project at home.

resources.description: How to run effective family meetings.

modules.title: Family Roles
modules.prompt: List three ways your family works as a team and one way you can support each person.

modules.title: Chore & Routine Plan
modules.instructions: Create a weekly responsibility chart with tasks, schedule, and accountability plan. Upload notes or photos.

modules.title: Lead a Family Meeting
modules.instructions: Plan and lead a meeting. Summarize agenda, decisions, and what worked well.

modules.title: Family Budget Basics
modules.instructions: Review at least two budgeting guides. Capture income sources, essential expenses, and one savings goal.

modules.title: Family Service Project
modules.instructions: Complete 3.5+ hours improving home life (organize space, care plan, sibling support). Log tasks, hours, and impact.
